message: A lot of my friends have been talking about Drum & Bass lately, do any of you guys listen to this a lot? What are some good bands to get started with?
Led Zeppelin, The Who and Rush are all bands with great drummers and bassists
I don't think he knows its its own genre of music. Be enlightened. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drum_and_bass
although there are some good dnb mixes, like noisia's fabriclive http://www.fabriclondon.com/store/catalog/product/view/id/91/s/fabriclive-40/category/8/
drum and bass is quite... I don't know, stuck to the past :)

DnB is just *so* last decade. Though I still like the jazzy end of it like LTJ Bukem.

These days DnB has been absorbed (or vice versa) by Dubstep. And that has also got old and decadent (in record time).
